thread.title: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
thread.title_full: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs

title: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
text:
> Sports CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs FILE - This is a 2015 file photo showing CC Sabathia of the New York Yankees baseball team. Sabathia is checking into an alcohol rehabilitation center and will miss the postseason. The team released a statement from the pitcher Monday, Oct. 5, 2015, a day before New York plays Houston in the AL wild-card game. (AP Photo/Chris O'Meara, File)
